name: General Incident Response Playbook
description: Standard playbook for security incident response

steps.title: Identify and Classify Incident
steps.description: Determine the type and severity of the incident
actions: Classify incident type (malware, intrusion, data breach, etc.)
Assign severity level (critical, high, medium, low)

steps.title: Contain the Threat
steps.description: Immediately contain the threat to prevent further damage

steps.title: Preserve Evidence
steps.description: Collect and preserve evidence for investigation

steps.title: Eradicate the Threat
steps.description: Remove the threat from the environment
actions: Restore from clean backups if needed

steps.title: Post-Incident Review
steps.description: Learn from the incident and improve
